radiographic_examinations.findings: Lytic lesions in the first lumbar vertebral body and right iliac crest, new retroperitoneal para-aortic and paravena caval lymphadenopathy.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Development of new lesions and lymphadenopathy compared to the previous CT scan.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT scan of head, neck, and chest

radiographic_examinations.findings: Foci of radiotracer activity within the first lumbar vertebral body and right iliac crest.
